long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GoldToken Enhancement Suite modifies the interface on http://goldtoken.com so you spend less time looking at your gamesheet and more time playing your games.

This is still pretty early in development; more features planned. Be sure to adjust the extension options in case the default options don't suit you!

Current features:

* Rearrange the entire gamesheet! Remove columns or sections you don't use, or collapse the whole thing into a single column to better utilize the space.
* Ensure user icons fit on a standard-height line, or remove them entirely.

Changelog:

v1.1.3:

* Adding Game Invitations to layout no longer causes Open Game Invitations to show up.

v1.1.2:

* Added chum and game invitations to layout editor.
* Fixed bug causing edited layout to not show up after playing all available turns.

v1.1.1:

* Fixed a bug making playing most games impossible.

v1.1:

* Changed the way gamesheet reordering works. It is now much easier to use and much more powerful.
